item.description:
two pictures with great casts, great stories, great endings. HOOSIERS, admittedly one of the greatest film on sports, w/ Gene Hackman. and MYSTERY, ALASKA, where a town in ALASKA takes on the NY RANGERS playing pond hockey...Hoosiers  is Gene Hackman dealing with a very small team which makes the state championships in basketball in the 50's.. a small town and all the other issues...like love, like politics, like alcoholism.  you will love it.

Mystery, Alaska is a small town in alaska, where else, that eats, sleeps, and lives playing hockey .... awesome shows, both... for men and women alike... just fun to watch.
item.name: 2 great films: Hoosiers, and Mystery, Alaska
